111.content:
The two would-be shrinkers looked down at the coin, where the face denoting "Heads" smiled back upward at them. Kyo began to giggle.

"That means I win!"

Yuuta felt very odd, thinking about the prospect of shrinking his best friend. He closed his eyes and fired. Sure enough, Kyo began to decrease, growing slightly shorter and shorter every second. Her clothing looked baggy on her as well. As she shrank, Kyo continued to giggle, her voice growing higher and higher.

"Oh, thank you, Yuuta! I always wanted to be Alice in Wonderland! Look! Down I go!"

Yuuta was astonished! Kyo, a shrinking fetishist?! Kyo's short skirt fell down around her ankles and she simply stepped out of it, along with her oversized sandals. Yuuta watched as the brown-haired girl struggled within the confines of her oversized white shirt. Her arms wriggled a bit, and she produced an enormous lace bra which could now hold her entire body, provided she rolled up into a perfect little ball. Yuuta blushed. Eventually, her head collapsed into the collar of her shirt and Yuuta's best friend was reduced to a tiny lump in its fabric. She giggled again, sounding like a playful little child, emphasis on little.

"This is so cool! Look at me! I'm sooo tiny!"

She wriggled to the surface and stood up, now completely naked to the world. Yuuta blushed even deeper, but Kyo was enjoying her shrink too much to care about nudity. If anything, she revelled in it, showing off and dancing around explicitly. She lay down on her new all-white photo shoot and struck an adorable little cheesecake pose.

"Hey there, big boy."

Yuuta couldn't help but feel turned on. Was Kyo getting to him? He needed a distraction, and fast!

11311.content:
Kyo was ecstatic, she was completely beside herself. Her lifelong dream of shrinking was finally realized, thanks in no small part to her best friend and equally tiny companion, Yuuta. Just being up here, on top of the counter and walking around all the comparatively huge things made her excited. Perhaps the most enjoyable thing for her was being able to actually wear her own doll's clothes, it made her feel super tiny and she loved it!

As she paced across her much larger world, Kyo came across the shrinking ray. It was laying upright on the counter, and it looked a little lonely. So, the freshly shrunken girl ran over to it, bending down close enough that she could touch its settings.

Oh, Yuuta, did you drop this in all the excitement? Kyo wondered. It would be just like him, always so clumsy.

"Hmm..." Kyo mused, assessing the controls of the advanced little machine.

The shrinking ray was a lot bigger then she remembered it being, due to her being so downsized. Luckily for Kyo, it was still small enough that she could easily operate it, should she choose do to so.

Kyo knew that she should probably just take it down to Yuuta and let them both decide what to do next. However, she was feeling extra playful and devious right now, and had other ideas.

Maybe I should shrink myself even smaller... Kyo thought, immediately loving the idea of becoming even tinier. It was cool enough being so small already, but if she got even smaller then surely things would be that much more interesting for her. She did love being tiny, but Yuuta was also 6 inches tall right now, so if she went to him it would hardly feel like she got smaller, since they'd practically be the same size.

Ooh! Maybe I should make Yuuta smaller, instead! Kyo giggled to herself at the thought. A smaller Yuuta meant nobody to boss her around while they were tiny, as he was sure to want to do. He was her friend, but he could be a bit of a stick in the mud sometimes, too. So, shrinking him to doll-size compared to her current doll-size would easily remedy that problem.

"Hey! What are you doing up there!?" Came Yuuta's tiny voice from below, he sounded a little worried, and a little irritated. "And do you see the shrinking ray? I think I dropped it while shrinking!"

Kyo kept giggling to herself as she ignored him for the time being. Her next move was going to be a surprise for him. She just hoped that he wouldn't mind...

Yuuta was puzzled about what was happening, everything was bigger, he could tell that much. Had the shrinking ray worked the first time after all just at a very slow pace, he wondered. He was deep in thought, trying to figure things out, he wasn't paying too much attention to anything else. So he didn't notice when Kyo had crept in front of him, impatient from waiting to see the shrinking ray in action. Kyo shouted out to him.

"What's the hold up, Yuuta!?" Kyo shouted loud as she could, her impatience very apparent in her voice.

"Waagh!" Yuuta yelped in surprise.

His hand clasped up and inadvertently pulled down on the shrinking ray's trigger. A much brighter beam then before shot out from the ray and struck Kyo right in her chest. Immediately she started shrinking down at a very fast pace!

"Wow! It's really working, I'm shrinking!" Kyo exclaimed in excitement as she shrank. "Haha, look at how big you're getting!"

"Kyo, no!" Yuuta shouted, worried for her safety. "I'm sorry!"

"For what, Yuuta!?" Kyo asked happily, as she neared half her normal height. "Look at me! I'm getting smaller! These big clothes are becoming a hassle!"

Kyo stepped out of her oversized clothing and stood before her friends in the buff. "Much better!" She said.

Yuuta blushed and looked away quickly, before regaining composure and speaking, "No, Kyo! I think the ray actually had worked the first time, it really did start shrinking us, even Etskuo! But at an almost unnoticeable rate!" Yuuta explained to the shrinking brunette.

"What! But, what does that mean for me?!" Kyo asked, now starting to get a little worried about being even smaller than half her normal size. "I mean, I got shot by the ray twice!"

"I'm not sure, but I believe you may end up incredibly small!" Yuuta tells her, he thought fast about keeping Kyo safe if she did get as small as thought she might. So he knelt down and motioned for her to come to him, he guessed she was just under 2 feet tall at this point and he noted, still getting smaller. "Please hold on, I need to get you to higher ground while it's still safe!"

Kyo ran up her comparatively giant friend and held her arms up. Yuuta lifted her up with ease and felt strange holding the naked and shrinking girl, but stayed focused and thought about where to put her that he could find her when she finished shrinking. He eyed his desk in the corner of the room and went there. He lowered his hand down to it and Kyo jumped off. Yuuta stood up and saw that Kyo was only about 10 inches tall now. He thought about what he would do if she shrunk too small to be seen, and came with something. He turned to Etskuo.

"Etskuo, can you please bring me a microscope from the other room?" Yuuta asks.

"A microscope? Do you really think Kyo will get that small?" Etskuo asked.

"I don't know, but I'm not taking any chances." Yuuta replied, Etskuo nodded and ran off to get the microscope.

Yuuta looked down at his desk and to his horror, found only a little speck, which he guessed was Kyo, she was so small now. He estimated her to be standing at only half an inch tall! He also saw that her shrinking had finally stopped, much to his relief. She appeared to be shouting something at him, but he couldn't hear anything other than little squeaks, since her voice had shrunk so small. He pulled up a chair and sat down to get a better look at Kyo's incredibly tiny form.

"Yuuta!" Yuuta could now hear Kyo shout up at him.

"Yes, Kyo?" Yuuta asked in a soft voice.

"This is awesome!" Kyo shouted.

"Uh, heheh, I'm glad you're enjoying yourself..!" Yuuta sighed, at least she was having fun and was still all right. Next...

"That's true. Plus some of us have jobs," Flora adds to why they should return to normal.

"Yeah. But it's been really fun," Etskou says with a smile and gives Yuuta a quick kiss. "We also found some love during this time,"

"Y-Yeah," Yuuta says with a nod with a smile on his face.

"I hope you can be a good boyfriend to five women," Masami says with a smile.

"He'll do fine. Besides we're all going to get married one day," Kyo says with a smile with a fist bump.

"I think that would be difficult," Flora says to what Kyo said.

"We'll find a way. We found a way to shrink people," Kyo says nonchalantly.

Flora giggles at Kyo response.

"Danm Straight," Akira adds with a smile as well.

"It will be a wedding to remember," Masami says with a smile.

"I hope we can a happy life together," Etskou says with a smile.

"I get pretty lucky at geting some amazing women," Yuuta thought a smile.

The group goes near the shrinking ray, Yuuta and Masami set the ray to turn everyone back to their normal heights.

The group is able to grow back to normal heights after being hit the beam. They all give each other kisses and hugs when they return to normal.

Yuuta, Kyo, Etskou, Flora, Akira, and Masami return back to their normal lives after returning back to normal. They were able to keep their secret at dating each other for a little bit but it was soon found out later. Luckily they were able to work things out and now the lovely group were able to date each other and marry each other with out any problems.


Yuuta was able to make some money from some of his other inventions. The reason for this is that Yuuta wanted to keep the shrinking ray a secret, worried what others could do with it. But it is also becaues he wanted to continue to some fun with his wives with the ray.

Kyo, who lived with Yuuta enjoyed living with Yuuta and the other women. The brunet would help Yuuta and Masami with their inventions. Kyo and Etskou would spend time together as watching TV, going for walks and others things. Akira and her would have some fun as well but more in a kinky way. Etskou still works at her job as Florist, the black hair women became quite happy when her and her loves were able to get married. Etskou enjoys helping Yuuta with his inventions and their time in her garden, with Yuuta learning to plant flowers as well making some good memories in the garden. Kyo and her would hang out when Yuuta is busy and would always have fun. It took some time to get use to Akria's teasing the shy women would tease back and two got to know each other well. Masami and Etskou were good friends before the shrinking indecent but became great friends.

Akira had fun with her husband and wives as she enjoyed being with them as well being a famous actress. Even when busy Akira would always talk to her loves over the phone or internet about what is happen and if she needed a bit of cheering up.

Masami quit her lab job and join Yuuta in helping with Inventing. Yuuta and her got along pretty well before the shrinking incident but now they were able to read each other mind and help make new inventions that help everyone out. Masami would always have fun times with her wives as she hang out with them to blow have some steam.

Flora is quite happy living with everyone. She lead a lonely life before meeting everyone and always remember the shrinking indecent as a warm memory. It took some time but Flora was able to love everyone on a more real level instead of a surface skin relationship

The group continue to love each and help each other to this day. Thus this a truly happily ever after for Yuuta, Kyo, Etskou, Flora, Akira and Masami.

1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
It's been two months since the shrinking incident and becoming everyone become a couple with everyone. The group would get together every now and then to talk, watch movies and some time love making.

Flora has been having fun being with Yuuta and the others. The red head never felt this happy before and didn't want to leave the group.

One day though Flora seem to be distracted by something when she came over to Yuuta's house so the group could visit each other.

"What's wrong Flora?" Kyo asks the red head head. Right now it is only Kyo, Masami and Flora in the living room as Yuuta, Etskou and Akira went out to buy some snacks and a couple of movies to watch.

"Yeah, you can tell what is happening and we would all help you," Masami says as she joins in Kyo concern for Flora.

Flora is happy that everyone that she is dating would always help her or cheer her up.

"Well, I think it's time to know who my employer was when I tried the shrinking ray," Flora begins and she takes a sip of her tea. "The employer is three young women,"

"Really!?" Kyo says a bit surprise to find out who hired Flora. "I thought they would be old guys or something,"

"I figure you would think that," Masami adds with a bit of giggle. "So can you tell us anything else about them?"

"Well.. I can tell you their names and appearances I suppose," Flora says and takes another sip of tea, then continues to talk. "One of the young woman is named Koharu Manjusha, she is eighteen years old, 4"11", Messy green hair that reaches her shoulders, light blue eyes, freckles on her face, she is sweet girl but others would always make fun of her height and she would get angry really quick, always wore a white sun dress with red flip flops, Koharu is also a c cup if you were wondering,"

"She sounds like a cutie," Kyo says as she tries to visually what Koharu would look like.

"My guess would be that she would have wanted to make her self grow," Masami thought wanting to learn about the other two.

"The second women is Ano Tonari, she is twenty-one years old, 6"6", long white hair that ended near her rear, grey eyes, a x-shape scare on her cheek, she is very strong, even if she doesn't look like it but is very clumsy and gets embarrassed a lot especially when people teased her about her tall height. Ano wore simple clothes such as a red shirt, blue jeans and white shoes. Flora finises explaining the second person.

"WOW! She's really tall," Kyou says as she is starting to get interested in these people.

"I guess she wanted to shrink her self to a smaller height," Masami thought as she saw a simple reason why those two wanted the shrink ray.

"The final women is Yui Zinovia," Flora finishes and takes one more sip of her tea.

"She hired you!?" Kyo and Masami both shout at hearing that name.

Yui Zinovia is one of the most known business women, At twenty two years old she is head of her own company. Yui height is 5'5", bowl-shaped light-blue hair, wore business clothes and always had a serous look on her face.

"Yes. Yui is a kind women but very strict," Flora adds as Kyo and Masami get over the shock.

"What did she want the ray for? Like to get an edge over the other companies?" Masami asks.

"No. I believe she want to use the ray to take control," Flora replies and this shock Kyo and Masami. "Yui wants to make sure the world is in order. So if the ray was true she would try to take over the world,"

"Really. Sounds Super villainy to me," Masami adds after hearing Flora.

"It's a good thing you got shrunk back then. Or you would have have given them the ray," Kyo says with a smile.

"Yes, I'm glad as well. But those three are still bugging me about it," Flora sighs as the only time she got to rest is when she hung out with Yuuta and the others.

"Really? What are they doing now?" Kyo asks wanting to know more.

"They're outside in their black car. That's reason why I asked not use the shrink ray this time," Flora responds and takes another sip.

"They're the reason why were not using the ray today.. Oh man and I wanted to be shrunken," Kyo says as she starts to pout.

"Are you sure they will stay outside? I mean they could come into the house and try to take the ray," Masami throwing her two cents in the matter.

"I don't really know......" Flora replies as she thinks what the three women would do.

"Oh! I think I have an idea," Kyo says with a smile and the women look at the brunette wondering what her plan is.

Kyo opens her mouth and says.....

Masami says to wait, she can hear them talking
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
"Let's invite them in." Kyo finishes.

"Seriously?" Masami asked. "You want to just let them come inside?"

"Sure!" Kyo said cheerfully, but then sounded more sinister as she continued with, "Aaand when they're inside, that's when we zap 'em!"

"Wow, Kyo." Masami said. "That's pretty dark."

"No, I think Kyo is right." Flora said, then mused over the plan, "Yes. If I invite them inside under the impression that I'll be handing the ray over to them, while you two hide in another room with the shrinking ray, then it's perfect! We can have them shrunk down to size."

"You too, Flora?" Masami asked as she shook her head. She couldn't believe how irresponsible her girlfriends wanted to be with the ray. "We can't just shrink people we don't like!"

"No, of course not!" Kyo exclaimed. "But this way we can get Flora's bosses off of her back.." She whispered her next words, "And then I get to shrink someone.."

Masami heard Kyo's murmurs. She stood up and pointed a finger at her girlfriend. "Ah-Ha! I knew it was just about you wanting to shrink someone!" She shouted.

"Okay, yeah..!" Kyo admitted. "But I can't be the only one, right Flora..?" Kyo asked, but then looked around the room and didn't see Flora anywhere, her cup was left on the table. Then, the sound of the front door opening and shutting could be heard, and Kyo put it together.

"Flora's going out to meet them!" Masami shouted. Kyo looked over and saw the inventor was peeking outside the window. She wanted to take a look for herself, and she saw it was true, Flora was outside walking towards a black car. She then felt something hit her arm softly, she looked and saw that it was Masami who had lightly hit her.

"She's becoming more like you!" Masami said.

"I don't know what you mean." Kyo replied trying to sound as innocent as possible. "Anyway, let's get the shrinking ray ready!"

With that, Kyo ran upstairs to grab her beloved shrinking ray, while Masami continued to watch Flora from the window.
Right now, she could see Flora talking to someone in the black car. She couldn't hear what they were saying, of course, but she assumed that Flora was trying to trick them into going inside the house. Then she realized that if they were coming in here, then she'd have to hide so as to not draw suspicion from them. She looked again and saw the car doors opening and three young women stepped out of the vehicle, they looked just like Flora described.

Masami sighed and pulled herself away from the window. Looks like we're in for another one those days... She thought. I can't believe I let myself get roped into these situations.

Kyo ran down the stairs, the shrinking ray in her hands, and went to Masami.

"Masami, hurry!" Kyo shouted. "We have to hide for this to work!"

Masami nodded, and the two young women hid in another room. Shortly after they were hidden, they heard the front door open and could hear Flora speaking.

"So, the ray is upstairs." Flora said. "Have a seat in the living room while I go get it for you."

Then they heard someone else speak, they couldn't tell who it was, just that it was one of the bosses.

"Thank you." She said. Her voice sounded quite formal. "And, there is nobody else in the house, correct?"

"That's right." Flora said. "Now take a seat. I'll be right back."

They heard Flora's footsteps approaching their room, she walked past it and continued down the hall and then up the stairs.

"Alright, it's now or never!" Kyo whispered to Masami.

Masami seemed to agree, not that she had a choice at this point. Kyo smiled a huge smile and hugged the shrinking ray closer to herself, she checked the settings one more time and then...

Flora takes it easy on Yui instead
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
Kyo jumped from behind her cover and aimed the shrinking ray at the three women in the living room.

"Hey!" She shouted. Getting their attention, and also Masami's, who was thinking about how to approach this situation, and was now wondering what in the world Kyo was thinking.

To Kyo, it was like playing a game for her as she held the ray in front of her face, like in one of her first person shooter games. An act that did nothing to improve her accuracy, but with the ray's new upgrades it didn't matter. She giggled as she pulled the trigger on Flora's still surprised employers. Immediately, a big and wide beam covered them in a bright light. It was a new feature of the ray that Yuuta and Masami had installed to shrink multiple targets at once, and another new feature was the ability to choose what would shrink. In this instance, Kyo had chosen the three young women in front of herself to shrink, but had chosen to leave their clothing alone!

"W-Who are you?!" The woman who Kyo assumed was Yui shouted. "What have you done?!"

And that was all that any of the three shrinking women could get out before being quickly reduced to mere inches tall, and trapped inside their now oversized clothes. Kyo smiled at her handiwork, she was glad the plan had gone off without a hitch.

"Kyo!" Masami shouted.

"Uh-oh!" Kyo winced, and turned around to face Masami. She knew the inventor was going to let her have it now...

"I can't believe that worked!" Masami said with a smile.

"Huh?" Kyo asked. "You're not mad?"

Masami shook her head. "No. Why would I be?" She asked. "I was worried, I admit. But, it looks like you knew what you were doing."

"Phew!" Kyo said, wiping her forehead. "Thanks, Masami."

Then, Flora came down the stairs.

"Where are they?" She asked, sounding quite serious now.

"Uh, right there." Kyo said, pointing to the three freshly shrunken women.

Flora entered the living room and saw three sets of clothing on the floor, with three small bumps inside each, which she knew were her former employers.
One of which had almost made it out of her clothes, Yui, Flora guessed from the clothes. Flora pushed past Kyo and Masami and knelt before the shrunken woman's regular sized clothing. Kyo and Masami watched the scene, they thought about how intimidating their former thief girlfriend looked, like a cat waiting for her prey.
Eventually, Yui made it out of her clothes, the first thing the shrunken woman saw was Flora looking down at her. She let out a quiet yelp of fear, the employee she had worked and pressured so hard for so long was now a giantess to her tiny form, and the relative role reversal was not lost on her.

"F-Flora!" Yui finally shot out.

"Hello, Yui." Flora said in monotone.

Next...

"You have to kidding me!"

Yui turns and sees the nude form of Koharu coming out of her clothes.

Kyo giggles at the sight of Koharu's shouting and threats. Kyo thought it was cute that Koharu would be tough at that height.

"Can you at lest help Yuuta and me carry stuff in!" Etsuko shouts as Yuuta and herself enter the house. "Thank you for helping me Yuuta,"

"It's no problem Etsuko," Yuuta replies as he rubs his nose with Etsuko's nose, the short black hair woman smiles and rubs back. The two go a further and see that Akira is standing in the door way of the living room.

Yuuta and Etskuo both wonder what made Akira stop in her tracks and deiced to look what happening in the living room. Yuuta and Etsuko are shock to their girlfriends with three shrunken woman. Yuuta notices that Kyo is holding the shrinking ray. Kyo could feel that Yuuta is giving her a look that said "What is going on,"

Flora kept watch of the shrunken, making sure they didn't run away.

But Ano did like being held by Yuuta as he was the one who moved the white hair woman. After a few minutes Yuuta, Etsuko and Akira are brought up to what happen.

"So these tiny ladies are Flora's bosses?" Akira asks as she looks down the tiny ladies.

"Yep. These are my bosses," Flora answers.

Yuuta thought it was a good idea, and Yui seem like a good person. Before Yuuta could open his mouth Kyo says.

1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
"How about if we play a game instead? One that involves the shrinking ray?" Kyo asked.

"What do you mean?" Yuuta asked his girlfriend, interested in her suggestion.

"I mean, Yuuta! A game!" Kyo exclaimed. "You know, like a board game that we can all play!"

"Okay, sure." Yuuta replied. "But what does that mean exactly?"

Kyo let out an exaggerated sigh from Yuuta's lack of understanding, and was about to explain it again when Masami spoke up.

"I think I get what you're saying, Kyo." Masami said. "You want to involve our little 'guests' here in some kind of board game, right?"

"Exactly!" Kyo answered. "Geez, Yuuta. How could you not get that?"

"Sorry, I don't speak Kyo!" Yuuta said, putting his hands up defensively and laughing a bit.

"Hmph!" Kyo mock pouted. "Anyway, I was thinking we could make things interesting by adding the shrinking ray to the mix. Sort of a, winner grows while the loser shrinks type of deal! What do think about that?"

"That sounds like fun!" Etskuo said.

"No it doesn't!" Yui squeaked from the table.

"Yeah!" Koharu added.

"No one asked you!" Flora shot back.

"Ooh, but I like the way you think, Kyo!" Akira exclaimed. "Actually, I think I have just the thing, hold on a second..."

Akira left the room to get her game, leaving everyone else to figure out the details. But first, the tiny, shrunken women on the table begged and pleaded to be returned to normal and not have to play whatever strange games these relative giants had in store for them. Well, all except for Ano, who was to busy being astounded by how big everything was to her tiny form to protest.

"Please listen!" Yui implored. "I swear we'll leave you all alone if you just restore our heights and let us go!"

"C'mon! You people should hear yourselves, you sound sick!" Koharu shouted. "All of you!"

"Oh, that's rich!" Flora laughed. "Coming from the same people who wanted to use the shrinking ray to take control however they see fit!"

"That was just Yui!" Koharu shouted. "I, I only w-wanted to be a little taller is all..!" Koharu was having rough time of it since being shrunken, and this was a tipping point for the poor little woman. "Not smaller!" She cried, and started to tear up. Yui went to her side and put an arm on her shoulder. Ano was even brought back to reality by her co-workers cries, she looked at the petite girl with compassion.

"Oh, my..." Flora said, feeling a little guilty about having there women shrunken. She had looked on them with such scorn earlier, but now, in their pathetic and reduced states, they were just frightened little things after all.

Next...
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.title: Start of a game, or something else?

choices: Yui
Kyo, her new friend
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
Running down the hall, Akira had found the game she was looking for in a closet under a pile of other things. She brought it to Yuuta and Kyo's house for everyone to play before, and had left it there for future use. "Little Warriors", the game's rather appropriate title was plastered on the box, Akira chuckled as she read the name, having forgot it before.
She picked it up and brought it back to the living room where it seemed things had gotten a little awkward in the small amount of time she had been gone, she saw Koharu crying on the table, and everyone seemed to be entranced by the scene. Masami heard Akira come back though and looked at her, knowing she had to say something to break the silence.

"Oh, there it is..!" Masami said when she saw Akira holding the box. Everyone looked at Akira holding the box.

"Yep." Akira replied, setting the game on the floor, away from the sad scene. "What happened?" Akira whispered in close to Masami, who explained the situation.

"H-Hey, cheer up Koharu.." Kyo meekly said. She didn't like Flora's ex-bosses, but she also didn't like seeing someone cry in front of her. She'd do something about it if she could.

"Cheer up?!" Koharu shouted. "How can I cheer up when I'm only three inches tall!?"

"No, no, no!" Kyo said. Putting her hands in front of herself, as if to try and calm down the shrunken woman. "Please stop crying!" Kyo insisted. For all of her excitable tendencies, she wasn't very good at this sort of thing, but she had to give it a try. "Look, we'll all be playing a game, that's all! It's nothing to be worried about!" Kyo said, she figured if she could explain that to the tiny woman then maybe she'd calm down. "And that's not all, all of us will be playing! Not just you guys! So don't think of it as 'some sick game' when it's really not!"

"W-What..?" Koharu asked, wiping away her tears. "Do you mean that?"

"Well, yeah!" Kyo exclaimed with a big smile. "We probably got off on the wrong foot, and that's mostly my fault, but you guys were trying to steal our ray. But still, I owe you an apology..."

"I must apologize as well." Flora said. "I knew your intentions for the ray were not evil, unlike Yui's, but I still shrunk you and Ano down. And for that, I'm sorry."

"Me too..." Masami added quietly.

"I'm sorry, Koharu." Kyo said, then extended a finger to the tiny woman. "Friends?" She asked.

"Koharu, you can't actually believe her, can you?" Yui asked. "She's trying to manipulate you!"

Koharu had a decision to make now, her boss, or the people who shrunk her. It seemed obvious to go with Yui at first, but when she thought about it some more, the choice was harder to make. On one hand, Flora, Kyo and their friends had shrunk her and her co-workers down to this tiny size, the exact opposite of what she had always wanted. But then she thought about Yui, her famed boss, and the reasons she wanted the ray in the first place. It was to take over the world, she had been very convincing to get Ano and herself to join her on her plan of twisted righteousness. But in the end, Koharu chose...
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.title: Koharu's choice

choices: Koharu, who wants to grow back to normal first
Kyo, who wants to shrink herself to Koharu's size
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
Koharu shrugged her boss off of her. "No, Yui!" She shouted, sounding quite confident now. "You're the one who's been trying to manipulate us!"

"W-What!?" Yui shouted, she couldn't believe her ears!

"You, you may act kind... But really, that's just a front! All you wanted was to use the ray to take over the world!" Koharu shouted. "That's why Ano and I came here today, isn't it? To help you achieve that goal? I can't believe I'm paying the price for following such a foolish idea!"

1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
Akira explained how to play the game.

The basic rules were that everyone would be playing on the same board together, the smaller contestants could simply walk along the board, while the normal sized players moving pieces instead. To win. a player simply had to reach the last space on the board, the goal space. The way they'd get around the board was by rolling dice. There were three die, big, medium and small. The smaller one had 1-3 on it, the medium one had 1-6 on it, and the big one had 3-6 on it. The size of a player determines which die they can use. So smaller players move slower, while the bigger players can move farther. And there were multiple split paths on the board as well. So Kyo and Akira had effectively given themselves a handicap by shrinking themselves before the game started.
Every space on the board, while not part of the original game, was a card space, where the player would receive a card with instructions for that player, but sometimes the instructions were for another player instead, to mix things up. To further mix things up, Akira had taken the liberty to write down her own instructions on the cards they would use, mostly resulting in size changes for the players, but there were other things in there as well.

"Okay, sounds easy enough." Yuuta said after Akira finished explained the game to everyone.

"Right!?" Akira said. "And I've put some... Special cards in the deck as well..!"

"Oh my, that sounds dangerous, Akira..!" Flora laughed.

"Oh, you have no idea!" Akira exclaimed.

"So, wait. What happens when one of us reaches the end?" Masami asked.

"Uh, well.." Akira stumbled to think of something. She hadn't thought that far ahead yet, but then it came to her. "Why not..."

"Seriously?" Kyo asked. "I thought you'd want to go after them for sure!"

"Yeah, don't you think it's dangerous to leave him with Yui?" Akira asked.

Flora scoffed and folded her arms. "Well, it's true I don't trust Yui, at all. But I have much more trust in Yuuta, I believe he can take care of himself." Flora explained. "And not only that, our Yuuta is much bigger than little Yui, so there's no way she can overpower him." Flora sounded confident, and even oddly proud, about that last part.

"Well... When you put it like that, it makes sense." Akira says. She was a little disappointed, because it wasn't just to look after Yuuta that she wanted to go to the bath...

"You see now? Flora's right." Etskuo says.

"Okaaay..." Kyo groaned. "But if Yui tries something, she'll have to answer to me!"

"I don't think you have to worry about that, Kyo." Ano said. "Yui's not one to try something like that."

"Yeah, she'd never make a move unless she had all the cards already." Koharu agrees.

"Oh, that's good to hear." Kyo says.

"Well anyways, since we're not going, how about we continue the game?" Akira asks.

Yui dosn't want to talk and they finish their bath and return to the living room
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
It didn't take long for the two small humans to get to the bath room. Even though she hated being this small, Yui had to admit that it was interesting to see something like a rest room at this size. Yui notice Yuuta took glances at her along the way and wonders why. Yuuta stood in the middle of the bathroom thinking what to do.

"We don't really need to take a bath. We could just splash some water on ourselves and dry off," Yuuta suggests while not looking at Yui. The young man didn't understand why but he didn't want to embarrass Yui. Even if Yui and him are consider enemies, Yuuta felt didn't feel quite right.

Yui is quite surprised that young man would suggests that and is about to up the offer but then says.

"I don't think it will be that easy," Yui sighs and continues. "I think they will know if didn't take a bath. We might as this ridiculous business done with," After that Yui thought. "I also need to figure out why you seem so familiar,"

"Alright. Let's go and take a bath in the sink," Yuuta said. "It will be easier to take a bath in rather the tub,"

"That works for me," Yui agrees with Yuuta's plan taking a bath in the sink.

It too some time for the two small humans to use the toilet as a stepping stool and soon ended up on the sink. Yui is surprise at how spacious the sink is and gets in as Yuuta turns the faucet making sure the water is warm but not to hot. After the sink gets filled with water Yuuta joins in with Yui in the sink. It is quite for a couple of minutes as the two small humans blushing at seeing each other in their birthday suits. Yuuta works up the courage and asks.

"Um... Yui have you ever lived around in this area while growing up?"

"I lived in this area for a couple of years. Why do you ask?" Yui asks as the light-blue hair woman looks over to Yuuta.

"It's just that you remind me of I of girl I used to know...." Yuuta replies. "Sorry if this sounds strange,"

"No," Yui replies. Yuuta is surprise about Yui's answer. "You remind me of a boy I used to meet up with," Yui has a warm smile as she thinks back about all those years ago. "I remember our first meeting,"

___

A young girl of twelve walks out of a private school, the light-blue hair girls looks around and sees that others students were talking to each other. The twelve year old scuff at her colleagues and walks away.

"It must be nice to have time like that," Yui thought as the twelve year old continues to walk. Yui is always had a tight schedule and couldn't really get some time for herself since her parents wanted her to inherent their company. Yui knew that her parents wanted the best for her but some times she wished she could spend some time with the other children. But there is a bright side, the twelve year old found a place where she could relax a bit. Yui smiles at her self as she goes into a park near her school and goes through a couple of bushes until she ends up near an old house. The house is abandon but still in good shape and that was good enough for Yui. The twelve year old then enters the house and could wait to sit down and relax with a good book, but is stop when she hears a voice.

"Oh come on don't tell me that you found my secret base!"

Yui is surprise to see that someone else is in the house, it was only a brief moment but both persons in the house saw each others faces. Yui sees that the other person in the house is a nine year old boy with brown hair and green eyes. Yui turns around so the boy would see any more of her face. Yui is scared that her parents would soon learn of this place and then give her more work to do.

"I'm sorry. I though you were someone else," The boy apologizes after yelling.

"How did you find this place?" Yui asks without turning around and trying to take control of the situation. This took the boy by surprise at how quick the older girl is to ask that.

"I just found it, that's all. I just wanted a quite place that my friends didn't know about," The boy replies hoping that his honest answer would be good enough for the girl.

Yui could tell the boy is telling the truth and wonders if they could share this abound house.

"Okay I trust you. I think we can share this house. But I don't want you to see my face, is that clear?" Yui asks trying to make a deal with the young boy.

"Mmmmm. Okay I'll agree with that, but I think it will be hard for us not to each others faces," The boy said and tries to think. "OH! Wait right there! I think I have something that will help us,"

Yui then heard the boy run off and quickly return. Yui then saw a arm come behind her with a mask in had. The mask is light blue version helmet is some super hero show.

"This should work to cover our faces," The voice of the boy from behind. "I made these my self,"

Yui takes the mask out of the boy's hand looks at it for moment. Yui found it a bit funny that the boy would suggest something like this but goes along with it anyway.

"Alright. We'll use these. Thank you for the mask," Yui then puts the mask on and is surprise at how well she is able to able to see out of it. "Are sure you made these? I never wear a mask that I could see so well out of," Yui turns around and sees that the boy is wearing the same type of mask but it is white with orange eyes with a light blue scarf.

"Yep," The boy sounding proud about his masks. "With these I can't even see your light green eyes,"

Yui tensed up a bit from the boy remembering what color her eyes are.

"So you know the color of my eyes. Do know anything else?" Yui asks tying to figure out at how much the boy saw of her.

"I-I only got a good look look at your pretty eyes! I mean I only got a look at your eyes," The boy sounding flustered and trying to cover what he said. Yui giggles at the boy's complement.

"It's okay. As long as you don't remember anything else about my face," Yui said. "By the way you have some nice as well,"

"Um.... Thanks," The boy replies feeling a bit red. "So what do you want to go by?"

"Go by?" Yui asks not sure what the boy is getting at.

"Well since this is our secret base and you don't want us to see each others faces, we might as well go by different names well," The boy said. "I want to go by Fukushi,"

"Mmmm, why that name?" Yui asks the masked boy.

"It's the name of the hero in Masked Sentai. He's really cool," Fukushi replies with a smile. "He's so smart and can invent so many things for his suit! He is also very kind. I want to be someone like him,"

Yui smiles warmly at how passionate her new colleague is about this Masked hero show.

"I'll agree to call you that but only if you call me Nordri," Yui said.

"Thanks. So why do you want to be called Nordri?" Fukushi asks his new friend.

"Nordri is the main character of the book series called Phantom Knight. She is so calm and make any decision. Nordri always is able to find people happy and having her own freedom. You have to read them some time," Yui smiles at talking about one of her favorite books.

The two children continue to talk about their two favorite things before they had to leave. Yui enjoyed talking to her new colleague and couldn't wait to meet him again.

___

After hearing the story Yuuta has a surprise look on his face. Yui wonders what's wrong Yuuta until he says.

"That's the same way I met the girl you remind me of,"

Yui then gives her own surprise look on her face. Could Yuuta be Fukushi those many years ago?

"What happen to you? Yuuta asks. Yuuta thought him and that girl become closer during those three years. Then one day when he went to his secret base, he only found a note from the girl that said, "I'm sorry but we must part ways,"

Yuuta saw that Yui's stern expression turn into a sad look. Yuuta wonders what happen with his friend.
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.title: Taking a bath and a memory.

choices: Yuuta and Yui finish their bath and head back to the board game.

1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
There is silence between the two small humans, Yuuta tries to figure out how he could make Yui talk. After bouncing a few ideas in his head, Yuuta figures that starting out with more small talk could help. While Yuuta and Yui used hand soap to wash their hair, Yuuta buts his plan into action.

"Say do you remember that time when we planted some flowers at our secret base?"

Yui smiles a bit from Yuuta mentioning the flowers.

"I do. I also remember you making an invention that would water the flowers if couldn't get to the base,"

Yuuta blushes at the mention of that part of the story. His younger self thought it would be a idea to use rope and some buckets to help water the flowers. All it did is give him and Yui some rope burns and bumps from the buckets fall on them.

"I didn't really think that one through, I'll admit," Yuuta replies with a sigh. "We should have used watering cans,"

"We didn't really have to work with," Yui trying make Yuuta feel better. "It's a good thing I brought that first aid kit with me,"

"We ended up looking like couple of mummies," Yuuta chuckles at remember that time.

"I also remember that time when you thought you were alone," Yui said with a strong smirk on her face. Yuuta blushes madly at Yui is talking about.

"I thought it was just going to me there.... I just really wanted to react that part from recent episode of Masked Sentai," Yuuta replies and remembers something that would embarrass Yui. "You remember that time I found your fanfic for the Phantom Knight?"

It was Yui's turn to blush and looks at Yuuta with a stern look on her face. Yuuta started to get nervous from Yui glare at him.

"It's not my fault that it fell out of your bag," Yuuta says in defense and then Yuuta felt water splash on him. Yuuta looks and sees that Yui held in a giggle.

"I could always get you with that glare. Especially when we had that water balloon fight and I won," Yui sounds a bit proud about that last part. Yuuta feeling bit childish himself, then splash some water on Yui. This took Yui by surprise and as light-blue hair woman pulls back her wet hair so she could see, saw that Yuuta had a smile on his face.

Yui feeling a bit childish as well and splash Yuuta back and soon it become a splash fight between the two, after a few minutes the two tiny humans sit down after their splash match and continue to talk about old memories.

"I remember when I lent you my Phantom Knight books and you lent me your recordings of Masked Sentia?" Yui asks feeling a little bit looser.

"Yeah. When I return your books, I bought my own set afterwords so I could read them any time," Yuuta replies. "I also remember that you bought a couple of shirts of the Masked Sentia after you return my recoding of Maked Sentia,"

"I had to admit, Masked Sentia was really good and I thought Fukushi was cute," Yui replies with a warm smile on her lips.

Yuuta and Yui both have a couple of laughs until they stop. Yui looks at Yuuta with a some what sad smile.

"Those were the times huh. I miss those days," Yui said as she looks down at the ground.

"Yui..... What happen back then? Why did you stop our meet ups?" Yuuta asks as he looks at the older woman.

Yui thought for a moment about if she tell him everything or not and chose to tell him what happened. Yui takes a breath and replies.

"I quite didn't have as much time since I become the head of my parent's company at the age of fifteen,"

Yutta is surprise to hear this and wanted to say something but knew that Yui wasn't done with her story. Yuuta stays quite as Yui explains more.

"My parents died in a car crash and in their will, they had me as the one to inherit their business. I had to put all of time into school and help lead the company, so I had no choice but to leave that note,"

"Why didn't you tell me that?" Yuuta asked.

"I didn't want you to worry about me," Yui replies and then her face grew grim. "It probably for the best that you didn't now. Unknown to me at that time certain people in the company tried to take over the company. The people who tried to take over the company and leave me nothing, were people who I thought were my parents friends."

Yuuta saw Yui's face look a bit angry and continue to talk.

"That's when I learn that you couldn't trust anyone. That you must take control of every thing so you will not lose to anyone,"

"So that's why you wanted to take the ray....." Yuuta said after hearing Yui's story.

"Yes. I thought if would be easier If just took contorl of people's lives so I can make sure they can go in the right direction," Yui then looks at Yuuta with somewhat stern face. "You must hate me for what I became,"

Yui waited for Yuuta to say yes but that never came instead she felt Yuuta's warmth as he hugged her. Yuuta didn't care that they were both nude, he wanted to make fell Yui feel better.

"I'm sorry.... I wished I was there to help you out," Yuuta says as he hugs Yui a bit tighter. Yui is surprise that Yuuta is hugging her and saying what he said, the light-blue hair woman could only smile warmly as she hugs him back.

"Looks like your still a big softie even after all these years.. But that's what I liked about you Fuk- no Yuuta." Yui thought with a smile.
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.title: Talks, Splashes and hugs

When they get there, things are the same
1133212211221222121111212222111111121212.content:
Yuuta and Yui chatted some more about the good times they spent together as children. Yuuta pointed out that back then Yui was taller than him, but now she was much smaller, and he laughed at the change. Yui pretended to be upset at him, but couldn't keep it up and also laughed.
By the end of it, the two had managed to reconcile their lost friendship. But then it was about time to get back to the board. So Yuuta and Yui finished up their bath and got out of the sink and back onto the floor.

"Here, we can dry off with this." Yuuta points to a hand towel hanging from the sink, conveniently at a level that the shrunken people could reach.

"Okay." Yui said, and went ahead of him to the towel.

Yuuta stood behind and watched her disappear behind it to dry off in private. He couldn't help but notice that there seemed to be a lighter skip in her step, and the way she spoke now, not cold like before, but more relaxed, more open. After Yui and him realized that they were close friends in the past, she seemed like a different person. He never really thought that he had such an effect on her, but as he was thinking about her he couldn't help but smile himself, happy to have found his long lost friend after all those years. She had an effect on him too.

"Okay, I'm done." Yui said, coming out from behind the hand towel. She noticed Yuuta looking at her, a dopey, but content smile on his face. She blushed a little seeing him, her thoughts as she had been drying herself off were like the same as Yuuta's, she could tell just from looking at him. "Yuuta.. Go dry yourself off."

Yui's voice seemed to knock Yuuta out of his daydreaming stupor and back to reality. "O-Oh... Right!" Yuuta stammered.

He rushed to the towel and used it to dry off. All the while thinking how beautiful Yui looked after she came back from behind the towel. Seeing her after all these years was quite something to behold for the young man, his childhood friend had grown up well.
Yuuta was soon done with the towel and went back to Yui.

"Are you ready? Let's go back to the others." Yuuta said.

"Yes." Yui agreed.

The two walked out of the bathroom. But just before they turned the corner to leave, Yui stopped. She looked at Yuuta, she seemed to be a little worried about something.

"What is it?" Yuuta asked with concern.

"It's just that, well, after all the things I've done..." Yui slowly started. "The others..."

"Oh. Is that it?" Yuuta asked. He knew what Yui meant. "You're worried that they won't accept you?"

Yui nodded, her eyes widened with sort of a childlike fear of not being accepted. Yuuta laughed.

"W-What's so funny?" Yui asked.

"Trust me, Yui." Yuuta said with a smile, and putting his hand on the smaller woman's shoulder. "They'll be okay with you. You'll probably have to apologize to them first for everything you did. But, you'll see that they're very forgiving!"

"You think so?" Yui asked. She couldn't believe anyone would be so forgiving.

"I'm sure of it." Yuuta said confidently.

"Okay then, let's go back." Yui said.

Yuuta nodded and got back up, and the two went on their way back to the board...

"Hmph!" Akira pouted, Yuuta's non-answer only served to make her mind wander with crazy ideas of what went down in the other room. A sly grin appeared on her face as she asked, "Oh my god, did you two... You know, did you do it?!"

"Akira, please!" Yuuta exclaimed.

Yuuta's face was red, Akira took that as a sign that she was right, and giggled to herself. Yui, who was standing just inches away from the two, laughed at the scene. She couldn't hear Akira so well, but she could guess what she was saying to Yuuta.

Flora was also watching the scene, from just one space ahead it was hard not to. But from the odd way Yui was acting, laughing so heartily was certainly out of place for her, she could already tell something was up. She bit her tongue and waited.

While all that was going on, Etskuo had went and gone over and to the fourth space of the board. She was next to Koharu's piece, the tallest girl couldn't quite fit so well on the spaces anymore and was now using a piece of her own to keep her position.
